summary: Integrates Home Assistant with the Hass.io environment by exposing Hass.io REST API operations as Home Assistant services, enabling management of addons, snapshots, host actions, and core system functions, while tracking the Home Assistant version.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users and automations to control Hass.io features such as addon lifecycle, system snapshots, restores, host reboot/shutdown, and core service restarts through native service calls.
